latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: GPS latitude coordinate. Must be between -90 (South Pole) and 90 (North Pole). Example: New York = 40.7128

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: GPS longitude coordinate. Must be between -180 and 180. Example: New York = -74.0060

units.title: Temperature Units
units.description: Choose temperature unit system. Metric uses Celsius, imperial uses Fahrenheit.

apiKey.title: OpenWeatherMap API Key
apiKey.description: Your OpenWeatherMap API key. Get a FREE key at https://openweathermap.org/api (allows 1M calls/month). New keys may take 10-15 minutes to activate.

outputFormat.title: Output Format
outputFormat.description: Choose how you want the weather data formatted. 'detailed' includes all fields, 'simple' is flat structure for CSV/Excel, 'summary' is concise overview.
